generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks running down its center, marked with white lines and surrounded by buildings and sidewalks.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible on the sidewalks along both sides of the street, with curbs separating them from the road.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential apartments.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles along the street.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections, including one red light facing the camera.
- traffic sign: A "no entry" sign is visible on the right side of the street, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: A few trees are visible in the distance along the street, and some small plants are seen in balcony planters.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalks, including a woman with a child and a man walking with a bag.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a white van on the right side and several other vehicles further down the street.
- train: The tram tracks in the center of the road indicate the presence of a train (tram) system, though the train itself is not visible in the image.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible in the image.
- truck: No trucks are visible in the image.
- bus: No buses are visible in the image.
